actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the report accompanying each bill or resolution contain an analysis and evaluation of the environmental impact of the bill of resolution.

summary.text: Provides that, under the Rules of the House of Representatives, the report accompanying each bill or resolution shall contain an analysis and evaluation of the environmental impact of the bill or resolution.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the report accompanying each bill or resolution contain an analysis and evaluation of the environmental impact of the bill of resolution.
